verses.verse: Then He <S%H7121>cried<s%> out in my <S%H241>hearing<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7126>"Draw<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> O <S%H6486>executioners<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> with his <S%H4892>destroying<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H1870>direction<s%> of the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6437>faces<s%> <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> with his <S%H4660>shattering<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and <S%H8432>among<s%> them was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%> with a <S%H9373>writing<s%> <S%H7083>case<s%> at his <S%H4975>loins.<s%> And they <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from the <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> it had <S%H1961>been,<s%> to the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple.<s%> And He <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%> at <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4975>loins<s%> was the <S%H9373>writing<s%> <S%H7083>case.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5674>"Go<s%> through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> [even] through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H8427>put<s%> a <S%H8420>mark<s%> on the <S%H4696>foreheads<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H584>sigh<s%> and <S%H602>groan<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which are being <S%H6213>committed<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>"

But to the <S%H428>others<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> <S%H5674>"Go<s%> through the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him and <S%H5221>strike;<s%> do not let your <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>have<s%> <S%H2347>pity,<s%> and do not <S%H2550>spare.<s%>

<S%H4889>"Utterly<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H2205>men,<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men,<s%> <S%H1330>maidens,<s%> <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>children,<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> but do not <S%H5066>touch<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> on <S%H834>whom<s%> is the <S%H8420>mark;<s%> and you shall <S%H2490>start<s%> from My <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>" So they <S%H2490>started<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>temple.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H2930>"Defile<s%> the <S%H1004>temple<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H2691>courts<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain.<s%> <S%H3318>Go<s%> out!" Thus they <S%H3318>went<s%> out and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> [the people] in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as they were <S%H5221>striking<s%> and I [alone] was <S%H7604>left,<s%> that I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> out <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> Art Thou <S%H7843>destroying<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H8210>pouring<s%> out Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>?"

Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "The <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3966>very,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4297>perversion;<s%> for they <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> does not <S%H7200>see!<s%>'

"But as for Me, My <S%H5869>eye<s%> will <S%H2347>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall I <S%H2550>spare,<s%> but I shall <S%H5414>bring<s%> their <S%H1870>conduct<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>"

Then <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%> at <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4975>loins<s%> was the <S%H7083>writing<s%> <S%H7083>case<s%> <S%H7725>reported,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as Thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me."
